articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 2020 Dem Yang hits Biden over coal miner-tech remarks
articles.description: In a wide ranging interview, 2020 Democratic Candidate Andrew Yang joins MSNBC’s Ari Melber to discuss his latest surge in campaign donations, and how he plans to go “all the way” in 2020. Yang criticizes President Trump's airstrike killing Iranian leader, So…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Rep. Engel is not confident the president has any strategy for what might happen after this attack
articles.description: Rep. Engel is not confident the president has any strategy for what might happen after this attack. He said, "I get the feeling there is no strategy, that it is sort of the fly by the seat of your pants diplomacy."

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Amb. Christopher Hill says it's "questionable" the US made Iraq and surrounding regions safer
articles.description: Amb. Christopher Hill says it's "questionable" the US made Iraq and surrounding regions safer. "I think if you stack up the odds, this is going to get bloodier," he said.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Former Defense Secretary William Cohen talks about the implications of killing Soleimani.
articles.description: WATCH: Former Defense Secretary William Cohen talks about the implications of killing Soleimani saying, "We have been waging an economic war against Iran ... there isn't any question" Iranians will see Soleimani's death as an "act of war."

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Friday's Mini-Report, 1.3.20
articles.content:
Today’s edition of quick hits:
* More deployments: The United States is sending approximately 3,000 soldiers to the Middle East after thousands of people stormed the compound of the U.S. Embassy in Baghdad, three U.S. defense officials and one U.S. military … [+1775 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Democratic leaders say they weren’t briefed before strike
articles.description: Democrats in Congress make clear they were kept in the dark about the deadly military operation that killed Iran’s General Soleimani

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Trump goes where two previous presidents refused to go: Killing top Iranian general
articles.description: President Trump orders a deadly strike on the second most powerful person in the Iranian government, General Qassem Soleimani

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Iran’s top general killed in airstrike led terrorism crusade
articles.description: Following the U.S. killing of Iran’s top general, Qasem Soleimani, we are learning more about the depths of his power . MSNBC’s Ali Velshi talks with Ali Soufan, former FBI counterterrorism agent, CEO of The Soufan Group and author of "Anatomy of Terror: From…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Rep. Crenshaw calls Soleimani strike “a good day for America”
articles.description: While top Democrats urge the White House to provide Congress with more details on the airstrike that killed the top Iranian military commander, allies of the President are praising the action. Congressman Dan Crenshaw (R-TX), who sits on the Homeland Security…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: What happens if income inequality continues to persist?
articles.description: Ali Velshi talks about what the rise in income inequality in the U.S. means with Allianz chief economic adviser Mohamed El-Erian, who has written extensively on the issue.
